remarks: Inference joining the antecedents of two premises.  Copy of ~ ja with a different proof.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-ja.1 $e |- ( -. ph -> ch ) $.
wl-ja.2 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
wl-ja $p |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ch ) $.
